google.note: DataForSEO review text API failed repeatedly (Task In Queue) — listing data confirmed via google_maps_search MCP tool

facebook.note: Facebook shows 2 reviews but 'Not yet rated' — recommendation-based system

combined.note: Combined rating weighted toward Google (20 reviews at 4.8). Facebook has 2 recommendations (no numeric rating). Hello Peter has no listing.

businessContext.tagline: Dream Elite - Plan Elite - Build Elite

collectionNotes.googleReviewTexts: FAILED — DataForSEO google_reviews_by_place_id and google_reviews_search both failed repeatedly with 'Task In Queue' errors. 8+ attempts made across two collection runs. Listing metadata (rating, count, address, phone) confirmed via google_maps_search.
collectionNotes.helloPeter: No listing found. Searched hellopeter.com/plan-elite, hellopeter.com/elite-company-group, hellopeter.com/plan-elite-kzn. All redirected to homepage.
collectionNotes.facebook: Scraped via Bright Data. 2 reviews visible, 1 recommendation text extracted (Christopher Jackson, March 2024). Page requires login for full access.
collectionNotes.instagram: Instagram handle: @plan_elite_architecture. Could not scrape due to login wall.
collectionNotes.secondListingClarification: Previous collection referenced a possible second listing at 47 Shongweni Rd. Google Maps search confirms that address is 'Plantations Estate' (housing complex), NOT Plan Elite. Only the 58 Inanda Rd listing is Plan Elite.
